title: On Her Trail: My Mother, Nancy Dickerson, TV News' First Woman Star
description: A former White House correspondent for Time magazine examines his stormy relationship with his mother, describing his mother's role as a pioneering woman journalist, the lavish political soirees that marked his parents' marriage, and his feelings of ambivalence about his mother's perpetual absence throughout his youth. 75,000 first printing.
author: John Dickerson
